features: 🔄【Smart Motion Tracking & 360 Degree Monitor】The home camera with 360° motion tracking and detection technology is designed to automatically track and follow any movement within its range. With this advanced feature, you can easily monitor your pets and have a clear understanding of their activities.

🆕【2023 Advanced Privacy Mode】Enjoy the simplicity of the Amorom room camera's private mode, accessible through the user-friendly AMOROM app. With this feature, there's no need to constantly unplug the camera anymore. Simply activate the private mode when you're in your humble abode to temporarily halt video recording, and deactivate it when you're out and about to resume video recording.

⭐【Stralight Night Vision & 2-Way Talk】The Amorom security camera is designed to deliver exceptional night vision with its 1080p resolution, ensuring that you can always capture clear and detailed images even in low-light situations. On top of that, this indoor surveillance camera allows for two-way audio, enabling seamless communication with your family members whenever needed.

👮【Motion Detection & Real-Time ALerts】Amorom home security cameras instantly send real-time alarms to your phone as soon as AMOROM wifi camera detect any movements from your pet, baby, or any potential intruders. This ensures that you are always aware of any activity happening in your home, no matter where you are.

🖥️【Work with Google Assistant&Alexa-enabled Device】The AMOROM app offers a seamless connection process with Google Assistant and Alexa. Once you add the AMOROM baby camera to the app, you can effortlessly connect it with Google Home or Alexa. then simply say "Alexa, show me the baby camera", the Echo Show will immediately display the baby's room.

Why can't connect to your wifi ? Amorom Camera only supports 2.4G WIFI network (Not 5G wifi). if your wifi router is dual-band wifi router, please check the wifi settings on pc and ensure the 2.4G WIFI Network is enabled. Why the device goes offline after install to other places? The possible reason of offline is power failure or weak and unstable wifi signal. if the power adapter works well, please try to move the wifi router close to installation place, if it works again, the cause is weak or unstable wifi signal. Why the memory card do not record the video? After insert the memory card, we need to set the camera to be local recording by following the steps: Settings---Recording Settings---Local Recording----Non Stop Recording How to change the wifi network? Reset the device by long-pressing the reset button until hearing the prompt tone"di",then wait the camera restart and reconfigure it with the new wifi network

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing customer support!
reviews.reviewText: Update-The seller contacted me send me a replacement. Super kind and helpful. I’m extremely grateful with the help and customer service. Im extremely happy and grateful and love my camera works great!I bought this camera because someone posted a video and I thought this is great, perfect for my furrbabies. I loved it and thought it was good.It was doing great loved watching my babies when I was in my office . Picture quality is good. The voice feature is nice but has a slight echo. The problem is that it was working fine and suddenly the sensor detector stop functioning. Then after two days it stopped working completely. I’m very disappointed that it didn’t last. Only lasted one month.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works good for cost!
reviews.reviewText: I got them for my boyfriend and he loves them. The motion sensor works. He loves that he can watch it on his phone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great little camera /quick setup
reviews.reviewText: Just make sure you are on a 2.4g network and the setup is speedy. The nightmode it good. I got this camera to see my cat when I’mAway. I hate leaving her. I can talk to her too. Works well. I like that I can put it in private mode. Not sure if the cat will be happy that I can bother her. Will be funny to see her snub me.The price was right and I think quality is really good taking price into consideration. Does all it was advertised to do.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: We use this product to watch our lodge breed dog when we are not here and it really does work. Every time he moves the motion to text and we can see what he is doing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazingingly Good Camera
reviews.reviewText: This camera functions perfectly and was easy to set up. Video is top notch and the panning function is smooth and quiet. Super great for the price and very good quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Do not buy! Not worth it!
reviews.reviewText: Camera only worked for less then 2 weeks. It stopped turning to see the whole room and eventually kept saying off line. When we tried to return they said it was too late. They give you less then 30 days for a reason. It’s not even worth the 20. Do not give them your money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Worked great at first
reviews.reviewText: Worked great at first now it keeps saying offline and I keep resetting it and everything but just goes offline.
